main event: A witness reported seeing a very bright light moving NE-SW in Covington on July 5, 1957.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 3 minutes., The object was described as too high and too slow to be an airplane., Only one object was reported., The report was part of Project Blue Book., A flashing light was also observed in the vicinity.
sighted object: a very bright light in the sky
witness description: Witness reported a bright light that was too high and slow for an airplane.
